Package index

NEesp2 Functions

Functions to create Northeast ESPS

Create indicators

create_chl()
Create Chlorophyll-a Indicator
create_coldpool_extent()
Create Cold Pool Extent
create_coldpool_index()
Create Cold Pool Index
create_coldpool_persistence()
Create Cold Pool Persistence
create_gsi()
Create Gulf stream Index
create_prop_sp_trips()
Create MRIP species recreational effort indicator
create_rec_trips()
Create MRIP total recreational trips indicator
create_spatial_indicator()
Create Spatial Indicator
create_sst()
Create Sea Surface Temperature Indicator
create_stratified_mean()
Calculate Stratified Mean Biomass
create_swept_area()
Calculate Swept Area Biomass
create_template()
Create an ESP template
create_total_rec_catch()
Create MRIP total recreational catch indicator
create_total_rec_landings()
Create MRIP recreational landings indicator
create_wcr()
Create Warm Core Rings
species_condition()
Create species condition indicator
species_condition_orig()
Create species condition indicator
species_range()
Calculate Species Range

Data visualization

Plot indicators

plot_condition()
Plot Condition
plot_risk()
Plot Risk Assessment summary
plt_indicator()
Plot indicator time series

Create tables

rpt_card_table()
Create a flextable with inset indicator time series plots

Other functions

find_files()
Locate files containing a text string
format_tbl_data()
Format data from report card spreadsheet
groupby_state()
Utility function to group by
nc_to_raster()
Convert netcdf to raster
